MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH28 and EH29 postcode areas of Newbridge and  Kirkliston. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am due to fault overhead equipment in the local area and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.03pm on Wednesday 17th February 2021.
